website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but it has some extra features, like color-changing LEDs and an ability to daisy chain speakers.
pros: Includes a light panel at the top of the wireless speaker that you can control to create a cool illumination
Large solar panel on top allows for charging the battery fast
Speaker and subwoofer design creates 360-degree sound
cons: Bluetooth connection can be spotty and may not work over expected distance

customer_reviews.title: Wrong plug type.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Only issue it came with the wrong plug type for the US.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne smith

customer_reviews.title: Save your money! Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is a POS! Purchased as a Father's Day present for my husband. Worked great for one day. Next day, the speaker rattled as if it had blown. Returned to Amazon and received a replacement. The exact same thing happened with the replacement. Now we are outside of the 30-day return window so not sure what my options will be. Save your money - do not purchase this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my birthday on April 23rd, it is now mid June. I use it daily and have not had to charge it once. I live in Florida I have left it out in some bad rain storms and it works great. The only down side is that it is not quite as loud as some other wireless speakers I have used, but those now do not hold a charge and have to be plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Scrub-Jay

customer_reviews.title: Big great sound.  Bluetooth easy.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, big, high quality sound. Loud enough for outdoors. Great bass. Easy to bluetooth connect and play music from your phone. (Hold the blue tooth button 5 secs to disconnect another phone which may be preventing you from connecting your phone). Battery lasts a long time, like a least 10 hours without a charge (and without sunlight). The best sound I've heard from a portable bluetooth speaker. One is to get great sound. One warning though, if you turn them up too high, especially with loud bass, they blow easily. Then they sound super fuzzy with each bass beat. This has happened twice to me.
customer_reviews.author: The Millers

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this speaker.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this at the end of May. Worked great until July 14 when the music all of a sudden is full of static. The sound quality is terrible. It has nothing to do with connectivity or WiFi or Bluetooth. It’s as though the bass is bottoming out. Sounds just horrible. So frustrating to spend over $200 on this and it dies three weeks after the return window. Buyer beware! Do not buy this product. You are better off taking a pile of cash and setting it on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buying another
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3. Bluetooth can experience interference at times but overall not a major issue. Sound is excellent and lighting makes these perfect for backyard parties. Weather proof is a huge plus as well. Haven't brought them in since purchase and don't plan to until winter.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: It’s fading fast ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I have had the speaker about 90 days. Had a little trouble pairing it with my other, older Monster speakers. Last few weeks the connectivity is sketchy. Cuts in and out a lot. And the battery does not seem to be holding a charge. Probably going to need to return this if I can. Really sucks.
customer_reviews.author: ArnieK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, has good range and it connects with other monster products for a music filled backyard. I connect two to my tv for good stereo sound around the pool and patio. I plan to buy one or two more. Sound is pretty good but don't expect Sonos or Bose quality sound. Solar charging is a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ortell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these speakers for around the pool. They provide 360 degrees of sound and sound great! They can recharge either with solar power or plugged in. We haven’t had to plug them in at all, just recharge in the sun, super easy. 2 of the 3 came with the European charger instead of the American one but seller sent the right cord after we contacted them. Great surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: A. Manns

customer_reviews.title: Really do like how this has functioned
customer_reviews.text: Really do like how this has functioned. am considering adding a second one to the collection so I can spread the music around on the deck. Update. Added a second on and am glad I did, this is a nice outdoor speaker for the price and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: great sound and Bluetooth from three rooms away.
customer_reviews.text: wow....sitting in my room w/the speaker three rooms away and it's still going from my phone. nice home range. very good sound. would like it a bit better quality of sound when cranked, but i'm not complaining too much. overall, excellent purchase and can't wait to use it when out and about camping.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome speaker, I love the lighting, the solar panel that recharges it and that it can get wet. BUT The thing that makes this speaker worth it is the sound... it's really clear, it's loud and it has phenomenal bass. This is going to be perfect for our pool parties.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Set an forget
customer_reviews.text: Bought it last summer. Connected it with my phone. A year later, still works like a charm. I leave it in the backyard in the summer when it rarely rains in CA, and store it in the shed during winter. It braved through a few light rains and had no problem. The sound reaches well in my modest backyard. The night lights are interesting and lets me easily tell whether I turned it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great addition to pool area
customer_reviews.text: while i'm not trying to have a outdoor rock concert, the ease of bluetooth connectivity and never having to charge it (phoenix AZ) , this product is great for adding tunes to the 1750 sq ft backyard
customer_reviews.author: kris passow

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! Super easy to set up and we were shocked at the sound quality. The lights are totally fun and I can control it with my phone or plug it in. Now if it could just keep mosquitos away....:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST SPEAKER EVER
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the SH*T!!! It is big, but it also produces BIG sound, the solar power lasts a really long time, and it can be taken anywhere. We sacrificed space in our suitcase to take it to Mexico because we love it that much!
customer_reviews.author: Carey D.

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a few Bluetooth solar speakers for my yard, this one is outstanding!!!! Sound quality and battery life are the best! Easily connects to Bluetooth and stays connected!! I’d buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Bluetooth range is literally 3 feet. It's a complete joke. My 3 year old beats headphones go 30 or 40 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: great sound and flexibility!
customer_reviews.text: We have a big yard and several seating areas, as well as lots of work to keep it up. It's so nice to have this speaker while working or having friends over . Sound is great, easy to connect and solar power works well - have not plugged it in yet.
customer_reviews.author: mary ann ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as I was lead to belive
customer_reviews.text: Very little base coverage for such a heavy speaker. Otherwise good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy 772

customer_reviews.title: Really nice unit. Always charged by the sun
customer_reviews.text: Sits by the pool. Really nice unit. Always charged by the sun. I never plug it in. Love the LED light at night. Sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Solar power
customer_reviews.text: I like how it connects so fast with Bluetooth, I leave it outside 24/7. No issues with sound
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Warrick

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Solar Charged Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Had this on an extended river trip and had to rely 100% on solar charging. We used this for hours every night and never ran out of power. Great sound, awesome ambiance (it virtually replaced a campfire as a gathering place). Very impressed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Suedkamp

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh..
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sweet. Me and my wife used it last night as we sat on the patio. She loved it so much. Going to get another one. Amazed by the sound and bass
customer_reviews.author: dcraig

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: We decided not to do an outdoor audio system after using these for a couple weeks. Bought in 2018 never charged them or took them inside. They still work like the day we bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: We use it in our backyard and the sound is amazing. It's never died on us with it being solar powered. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is loud is will be perfect for camping etc. App for this speaker is not very good however it’s not required to use the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Taneisha Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor speakers we have had.
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these units paired around our pool and love that they remain completely wireless.
customer_reviews.author: MetaNexus

customer_reviews.title: Great outside speaker
customer_reviews.text: Used this speaker all spring summer and fall outside on our pool patio .it was left out and exposed to the weather with no protection it has worked flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these every day. The LED is bright and the solar keeps them running. I wish I could afford 8 of them.
customer_reviews.author: David Grabovetsky

customer_reviews.title: Buying 7 More
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and I am very impressed, I am looking forward to link 7 more.. One speaker fills my yard with sound imagine 8, i will let you know...
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

customer_reviews.title: 1 just isn't enough.
customer_reviews.text: Half my friends and family have them now after hearing them, would highly recommend buying more than one and linking.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this speaker, I highly recommend it. It has GREAT Sound.
customer_reviews.author: alanlefkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Backyard Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect backyard speaker. The sound quality is Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth fail
customer_reviews.text: Did I get a dud? The bluetooth connectivity on my unit was very sketchy from the start and non existent after a few days. The app could not even pick up the speakers signal so that didn't work either. I have many cheaper bluetooth device's that work with my iphone with no problems whatsoever. I also tried it with my ipad & would not pair or play with that either. Glad I got it on prime, going back today.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip B Thistlewaite

product_meta.title: Monster SOLARA | Solar Powered Wireless Indoor/Outdoor Bluetooth Speaker
product_meta.description: Looking for a solar powered speaker you can use either outdoors or indoors? The Monster Solara solar powered indoor/outdoor Bluetooth speaker brings 360° of both light and sound wherever you go. The Monster Solara outdoor Bluetooth speaker is jam-packed with Features that are ideal for any event!
feature_bullets: Fez-play technology connects up to 7 other compatible speakers & syncs Audio playback

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #3,128 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#23,680 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
